name: Dueling Duo
description:
This is yet another game I made for school, but this time with a friend: CR (initials to protect identity).

Black stick figure and his best friend, less black stick figure go on a monster hunting journey through a dungeon, and see a beeg jellyfish. That is close enough to a monster, so they start throwing weird ball things at it. If that jellyfish had a brain, it would be very confused.

Controls:

A - Select

B - Backspace 

W and D - Move for Player 1

Left and Right Arrow - Move for Player 2
